A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing is an understatement. \nThere were too many plot holes and lack of character development/explanation. \nGreat villains and heroes were killed off in the least epic manor possible. This movie could have been great\, but any mystery JJ presented in the Force Awakens was quickly snuffed out.    Perhaps Star Wars is salvageable\, but most likely not....there is nothing left that excites me enough to see the next film in theaters.
